name: 侯劭毅
objective: 本課程將結合生物技術與化工原理來進行微生物、動、植物細胞之培養、酵素之提取、反應動力學、生物反應器的操作與相關參考數之獲取法、產品之分離程序等。
schedule:
week 1 cell
week 2 microbiology (1/2)
week 3 microbiology (2/2)
week 4 growth on plate
week 5 養菌 & amp;bioreactor
week 6 生長曲線示範
week 7 DNA
week 8 protein
week 9  mid-term exam
week 10 純化
week 11 enzyme kinetics
week 12  lipid & carbohydrate (1/2)
week 13 lipid & carbohydrate (2/2)
week 14 central dogma (1/2)
week 15 central dogma (2/2)
week 16 virus
week 17 疫 + Elisa
week 18 final exam
scorePolicy:
20% 小考
40% 期中考
40% 期末考
materials: 生物技術 第四版 張玉瓏等合著
